trans-unit.source: AAA The ts attribute allows you to include short data understood by a specific toolset.

trans-unit.source: BBB You can also use the <prop> element to define large properties at the element level.

trans-unit.source: CCC The tool attribute is used to specify the signature and version of the tool that created or modified the document.
